7 // Individual cable
8 class cable {
9  public:
10  double cost;
11  double area;
12  double mass;
13  double voltage;
14  double currRating;
15  double turbInterfaceCost;
16  double subsInterfaceCost;
17  cable();
18  cable(const cable &obj);
19 };
20 
21 // Family of cables
22 class cableFamily {
23  public:
24  std::vector<cable> cables;
25  double voltage;
26 
27  void set_voltage(double inVolt);
28  void set_all_cost(std::vector<double> inVal);
29  void set_all_area(std::vector<double> inVal);
30  void set_all_mass(std::vector<double> inVal);
31  void set_all_current_rating(std::vector<double> inVal);
32  void set_all_turbine_interface_cost(std::vector<double> inVal);
33  void set_all_substation_interface_cost(std::vector<double> inVal);
34  cableFamily();
35  cableFamily(const cableFamily &obj);
36  private:
37  bool initializeFlag = false;
38  void initialize_cables(int ncable);
39  void initialize_cables(size_t ncable);
40  void check_size(size_t nval);
41 };

44  //Vessel vector***************************************************************************************************************************************
45  //vessel defaults
46  /*
47  turbine and substructure install vessels by identifier value
48  1: leg stabilized crane vessel
49  2: mid height, mid sized jack-up vessel
50  3: mid height, large sized jack-up vessel
51  4: high height, mid sized jack-up vessel
52  5: high height, large sized jack-up vessel
53  6: shear leg crane vessel
54  7: derrick crane vessel
55  8: semi-submersible crane vessel
56  9: heavy lift cargo vessel
57  10: small AHST
58  11: medium AHST
59  12: large AHST
60 
61  array cable install vessels by identifier value
62  13: medium array cable lay barge
63  14: large array cable lay barge
64  15: medium array cable lay vessel
65  16: large array cable lay vessel
66 
67  export cable install vessels by identifier value
68  17: medium export cable lay barge
69  18: large export cable lay barge
70  19: medium export cable lay vessel
71  20: large export cable lay vessel
72 
73  offshore substation install vessels by identifier value
74  8: semi-submersible crane vessel
75  9: heavy lift cargo vessel
76  10: small AHST
77  11: medium AHST
78  12: large AHST
79 
80  feeder barges by identifier value
81  21: medium jack-up barge
82  22: large jack-up barge
83  23: medium jack-up barge with crane
84  24: large jack-up barge with crane
85  25: small barge
86  26: medium barge
87  27: large barge
88 
89  support vessels by identifier value
90  10: small AHST
91  11: medium AHST
92  12: large AHST
93  21: medium jack-up barge
94  22: large jack-up barge
95  23: medium jack-up barge with crane
96  24: large jack-up barge with crane
97  25: small barge
98  26: medium barge
99  27: large barge
100  28: sea going support tug
101  29: hotel vessel
102  30: mother ship
103  31: personnel transport vessel
104  32: dive support vessel
105  33: guard vessel
106  34: semi-submersible cargo barge
107  35: semi-submersible cargo barge
108  36: backhoe dredger
109  37: grab or clamshell dredger
110  38: fall pipe or trailing suction dredger
111  39: side rock dumper vessel
112  40: ballasting vessel
113  41: ballast hopper vessel
114  42: environmental survey vessel
115  43: geophysical survey vessel
116  44: geotechnical survey vessel
117 
118  vessel vector columns by index value:
119  0: identifier value to/from wrapper
120  1: length
121  2: breadth
122  3: max draft
123  4: max operational water depth
124  5: leg length
125  6: jack up/down speed
126  7: deck space
127  8: max payload
128  9: max lift capacity
129  10: max lift height
130  11: max transit speed
131  12: max operational wind speed
132  13: max operational wave height
133  14: day rate
134  15: mob/demob time
135  16: number of vessels required
136  17: accommodation capacity
137  18: crew capacity
138  19: passenger capacity
139  20: bollard pull
140  21: tow speed
141  22: carousel weight
142  23: max spud depth
143  24: max dredge depth
144  25: bucket size
145  26: grabber size
146  27: hopper size
147  */
148 
149 enum {LEG_STABILIZED_CRANE, // 1
150  MID_HEIGHT_MID_SIZED_JACKUP, // 2
151  MID_HEIGHT_LARGE_SIZED_JACKUP, // 3
152  HIGH_HEIGHT_MID_SIZED_JACKUP, // 4
153  HIGH_HEIGHT_LARGE_SIZED_JACKUP, // 5
154  SHEAR_LEG_CRANE, // 6
155  DERRICK_CRANE, // 7
156  SEMISUBMERSIBLE_CRANE, // 8
157  HEAVY_LIFT_CARGO, // 9
158  SMALL_AHST, // 10
159  MEDIUM_AHST, // 11
160  LARGE_AHST, // 12
161  MEDIUM_ARRAY_CABLE_LAY_BARGE, // 13
162  LARGE_ARRAY_CABLE_LAY_BARGE, // 14
163  MEDIUM_ARRAY_CABLE_LAY, // 15
164  LARGE_ARRAY_CABLE_LAY, // 16
165  MEDIUM_EXPORT_CABLE_LAY_BARGE, // 17
166  LARGE_EXPORT_CABLE_LAY_BARGE, // 18
167  MEDIUM_EXPORT_CABLE_LAY, // 19
168  LARGE_EXPORT_CABLE_LAY, // 20
169  MEDIUM_JACKUP_BARGE, // 21
170  LARGE_JACKUP_BARGE, // 22
171  MEDIUM_JACKUP_BARGE_WITH_CRANE, // 23
172  LARGE_JACKUP_BARGE_WITH_CRANE, // 24
173  SMALL_BARGE, // 25
174  MEDIUM_BARGE, // 26
175  LARGE_BARGE, // 27
176  SEA_GOING_SUPPORT_TUG, // 28
177  HOTEL, // 29
178  MOTHER_SHIP, // 30
179  PERSONNEL_TRANSPORT, // 31
180  DIVE_SUPPORT, // 32
181  GUARD, // 33
182  SEMISUBMERSIBLE_CARGO_BARGE, // 34, 35
183  BACKHOE_DREDGER, // 36
184  GRAB_OR_CLAMSHELL_DREDGER, // 37
185  FALL_PIPE_OR_TRAILING_SUCTION_DREDGER, // 38

187  BALLASTING, // 40
188  BALLAST_HOPPER, // 41
189  ENVIRONMENTAL_SURVEY, // 42
190  GEOPHYSICAL_SURVEY, // 43
191  GEOTECHNICAL_SURVEY}; // 44

193 // Individual vessel
194 class vessel {
195  public:
196  double identifier; //0: identifier value to/from wrapper
197  double length; //1: length
198  double breadth; //2: breadth
199  double draft; //3: max draft
200  double operational_depth; //4: max operational water depth
201  double leg_length; //5: leg length
202  double jackup_speed; //6: jack up/down speed
203  double deck_space; //7: deck space
204  double payload; //8: max payload
205  double lift_capacity; //9: max lift capacity
206  double lift_height; //10: max lift height
207  double transit_speed; //11: max transit speed
208  double max_wind_speed; //12: max operational wind speed
209  double max_wave_height; //13: max operational wave height
210  double day_rate; //14: day rate
211  double mobilization_time; //15: mob/demob time
212  double number_of_vessels; //16: number of vessels required
213  double accomodation; //17: accommodation capacity
214  double crew; //18: crew capacity
215  double passengers; //19: passenger capacity
216  double bollard_pull; //20: bollard pull
217  double tow_speed; //21: tow speed
218  double carousel_weight; //22: carousel weight
219  double spud_depth; //23: max spud depth
220  double dredge_depth; //24: max dredge depth
221  double bucket_size; //25: bucket size
222  double grabber_size; //26: grabber size
223  double hopper_size; //27: hopper size
224 
225  vessel();
226  vessel(const vessel &obj);
227  double get_rate();
228  double get_mobilization_cost();
229 };
